long_desc.thetext:
The Inspector Selenium test should at least cover the application's essential functionality: * Select a widget using the Inspect widget button * Select a widget using the Objects window's table * Select a widget using the Widgets window's tree * Make sure the Objects, Widgets, Properties and Console windows display the selected widget * Typing "this" in the Console window should return the selected widget * Modify a property (e.g. a label value) using the Properties window and check if it worked * Set the script URLs in the Selenium window and check if the toolbar is enabled
Additional tests: * Objects window: Filter and "by count" display mode * Widgets window: Check if child controls are only displayed if the corresponding option is selected * Properties window: Show/hide inherited properties, group by category * Console window: DOM explorer, filter * Selenium window: Add/remove command, record/playback functions, Selenese view
Implemented all basic tests except for property modification which is hard to check.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
